pages.title: Forging from the moon!
pages.text: The $(#008cff)Moonlight Forge$() is used to forge moonstone tools and weapons with the given ingot to make new powerful tools!
Check JEI for full list of Moonlight Forge recipes.$(br2)Quick tip is: $(br)[$(#008cff)Moonstone Tool$()] + $(br)[$(#008cff)Ingot$()] = $(br)[$(#008cff)New Tool!$()]

pages.title: Important Info
pages.text: For the forge to work, it must have a clear view of the moon. Meaning $(#008cff)it must be night to craft$(). It can see the moon through glass and other transparent blocks.$(br2)Also the forge keeps previous enchantments and durability and will apply those to the new crafted item! And Note: $(#008cff)higher up to the sky you place it, the faster it will craft!$()
If you're concerned with performance, the forge can be disabled by giving it a redstone signal. When powered it will not perform any moonlight checks or do crafting.
